body: @zferolie From my comparison with the older version, i noticed that some expressions were tweaked (eyes and mouths), Samus's anus became less 'donut-y', the bottom of pg 33 is different and 35/36 are brand new pages. Can't say anything about the dialogue, however. Technically, is mostly the same, so it shouldn't take long to see a colored/uncensored version of this remaster
So, whats different with this remaster? Looks pretty simular to the old one. Maybe some touched up art?
Isn't she supposed to be a new half
